item.title: House of Commons Standing Committee on Natural Resources (RNNR) Testimony
item.description: PDF of my briefing (English) submitted to the House of Commons Standing Committee on Natural Resources (RNNR) for testimony on the oil and gas cap. Speaking notes (check against delivery) are here (PDF).
